Title: State of Massachusetts Department of Insurance and Financial Services regarding PANDAS/PANS regarding insurance and IVIG treatment
Overview: Imagine one day your 7 year old child will not go outside has irrational fears of tornadoes is pacing at night not sleeping will only sleep when with you cannot go to school or cries the whole way due to separation anxiety this was our life after antibiotic therapy it got better for a while. Then a cellulitis eye infection started a snow ball effect now our 15 year old daughter is paranoid to be alone will not sleep without us cannot stay in school has major anxiety and fears please help us not live out this nightmare over again.  This is not a psychiatric disorder it is an infection that mistakenly attacks the basal ganglia part of the brain that controls behavior and ocd. This disorder is a reaction to inflammation.  Our child is suffering due to the politics of medical care there have been successful studies proving IVIG works for children with PANDAS where antibiotic therapy is not succeeding please let our child get the treatment she deserves. This treatment is not covered by insurance it costs $1000 per 10lbs of body weight.  We are expected to pay out of pocket an estimated $15 000 for 1 treatment.  Right now we are paying approximately $150-200 per month just in co-payments and medication we have tried homeopathic medicine boosting the immune system with pro-biotics and vitamin D.  When your daughter says I cannot wait until I am 16 so that I can get a job and save enough money to help pay for my treatment so that I don't feel like this anymore it is heart breaking.  Please sign our petition and help us raise awareness there are many children like ours out there suffering for the same reasons.
